name: Trail Blazer (TwitchyOrphan)
description:
Left mouse button to jump (and double jump). Collect pickups to make progression easier. Don't fall into space and be sure to avoid the asteroids!

Credit to GameDev.TV for laying the groundwork in the Skill Builder Season One quest (https://www.gamedev.tv/)

Credit to Synty Studios for most of the special assets used (https://syntystore.com/)

Credit to Dark Fantasy Studio for the background music (http://darkfantasystudio.com/)

All sound effects were pulled from www.freesound.org. Credits to each creator below.

Explosions:

https://freesound.org/people/SGAK/

https://freesound.org/people/lorenzgillner/

https://freesound.org/people/morganpurkis/

https://freesound.org/people/magnuswaker/

Game Over:

https://freesound.org/people/colorsCrimsonTears/

Take Off and Power Ups:

https://freesound.org/people/colorsCrimsonTears/

Jump:

https://freesound.org/people/Bastianhallo/

Feel free to leave a comment, I'm always looking for feedback on where to improve. Thank you for playing!
